assessment_item.title: ಸಹಾಯಕ ಸೈನ್ಯ ಪದ್ಧತಿಯನ್ನು ಜಾರಿಗೆ ತಂದವರು
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ಸಹಾಯಕ ಸೈನ್ಯ ಪದ್ಧತಿಯನ್ನು ಜಾರಿಗೆ ತಂದವರು
 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:5115"},{"text":"

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:5116"},{"text":"

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:5126"},{"text":"

ಲಾರ್ಡ್  ಡಾಲ್‍ಹೌಸಿ
